markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energize Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2639) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Evanescent Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2632)

</column>

---

Your magic energizes your wings, allowing you to fly farther. The fly Speed you gain from Evanescent Wings increases to 25 feet.

<title level="2">Energize Wings leads to...</title>
[Hero's Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2643)
name: Energize Wings
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Evanescent Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2632)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms.
</summary>
summary: You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms.
